text: Thomas B. Finley Law Office, also known as the J. F. Jordan Law Office, is a historic law office located at Wilkesboro, Wilkes County, North Carolina. It was built during the early 1880s, and is a small one-story frame building one room wide and two deep. It has sawnwork bargeboards and decorative finials in the Carpenter Gothic style. It is owned by the Wilkes Heritage Museum. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. The Thomas B. Finley House in North Wilkesboro was listed in 2008. ==References== ==External links== *Wilkes Heritage Museum website Category:Office buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Gothic Revival architecture in North Carolina Category:Buildings and structures in Wilkes County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Wilkes County, North Carolina
title: Thomas B. Finley Law Office
